title: Rewrite
text: Rewrite the equation in general form $${Ax}^2+Bxy+{Cy}^2+Dx+Ey+F=0$$, if it is not already.

title: Use A and C
text: Use the definitions of A and C to find the type of equation this conic is. If A and C are nonzero, have the same sign, and are not equal to each other, then the graph is an ellipse. If A and C are equal and nonzero and have the same sign, then the graph is a circle. If A and C are nonzero and have opposite signs, then the graph is a hyperbola. If either A or C is zero, then the graph is a parabola.

title: Answer
text: As A and C are nonzero, have the same sign, and are not equal to each other, the graph is an ellipse.
